page.title: 10Guisborough shops I
page.content: We undertook a survey of shops on the High Street (Westgate). 55 questionn- aires were given out; 25 completed. Most shops are long-established,some for over 30 years. The no.has gone up, ditto the no.of customers,as the town has grown.But only 2 shops used computer tech.(Hintons,a large chain store,& a music shop with a mail order business) When asked about competition from the twice-weekly market (on the cobbles in front of the shops) only 4 complained & the others welcomed it.Again, only 2 thought the super- store,Fine Fare, set up a year ago on the town's edge, reduced their tak- ings.Questions on the efficiency of local services brought angry answers & only 3 were happy.Most said a lack of parking spaces stopped shoppers coming to the town centre,& pro- duced congestion.
